manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: O NetBeans 5.5, Módulo de modelagem UML fornece os recursos de modelagem UML para o NetBeans IDE. Estes recursos incluem engenharia reversa e avançada, geração de código sem marcadores, suporte a oito diagramas diferentes, coleta de requisitos, padrões de design predefinidos e extensíveis e capacidade de gerar relatórios da Web do estilo Javadoc a partir de modelos. O modulo possibilita que analistas e desenhadores criem aplicativos usando uma linguagem de modelagem padrão. Conseqüentemente, os desenvolvedores podem gerar códigos-fontes a partir do modelo UML e atualizar o modelo a partir das alterações feitas nos seus códigos-fontes.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The VCS Generic Support module enables you to integrate any version control system for which there is a command-line interface (such as CVS, RCS, or SCCS) into the IDE. Support for individual version control systems can be added as profiles. Additional profiles can be downloaded from http://vcsgeneric.netbeans.org/profiles/index.html. Note that installing this module disables the built-in NetBeans 5.0 CVS support.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: This module installs a set of samples that illustrate discussions in the book "Rich Client Programming: Plugging into the NetBeans Platform", published by Prentice Hall in May 2007. After installation, choose File | New Project in the main menu. In the New Project wizard, you will find the samples in the Samples | NetBeans Plug-in Modules category. For information about the samples, go to Help | Help Contents and read the help topic "About RCP Book Samples" in the "RCP Book Samples" section.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: [DEPENDENCY: Requires NetBeans 5.5 and the UML Module] This is the UML Bank App Sample module. It creates a Java and UML project provided as a means of introducing you to the Reverse Engineering feature of the NetBeans 5.5 UML Modeling module. The sample Java project was reverse engineered to generate the sample UML Modeling project and its elements. Some diagrams are pre-created for you.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: A sample Java project with its reversed engineered UML project counterpart.

module.module_notification: To install this sample, you need the NetBeans Visual Web Pack, which you can download at https://netbeans.org/products/index.html

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: This sample application shows you how to use NetBeans Visual Web Pack to build a JavaServer Faces web application that uses the Ajax Map Viewer component. This application creates a custom Google map. The map includes marker text and a flag that pinpoints an address entered by the user.
